page.title: 18COURT FARM SPAXTON
page.content: It was a lovely sunny day. We were going down to Mr Dares Farm. We had an enjoyable morning looking around. First we looked at the milking parlour.It was so clean we did not need our boots. When we got there they had just finished milking and they washed the floor. Outside the Friesian cows were eating and roaming around. Some cows were due to have a calf. When we had finished asking our questions we walked over to the other side of the farm.There we saw calves and a bull. Some cows were in a shed, it was very clean. There was alot of straw for the cows to eat. When we went down Mr Dares farm i liked the milking palour. I loved the smell, that was my favourite thing. Mr Date was very kind because he fixed up a date for us to go down. We enjoyed our trip very much.
